scripts.build:dev:win32: yarn powershell mvn clean install `-DskipTests `-DskipITs `-Pno-showcase && yarn dist
scripts.build:prod:linux:darwin: yarn lint && mvn clean install -DskipTests=$(build-env global.build.test --not) -DskipITs -Pno-showcase && yarn dist
scripts.build:prod:win32: yarn lint && yarn powershell mvn clean install `-DskipTests=$(build-env global.build.test --not) `-DskipITs `-Pno-showcase && yarn dist
scripts.dist: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && yarn dist:sw
